item.description:
The out-of-body experience – also known as astral projection or soul travel – is one of the best ways to experience psychic reality firsthand.  Whether you are interested in having an out-of-body experience yourself or simply learning more about it, you’re in the right place.

The Boston OBE Meetup is sponsored by the International Academy of Consciousness, an international not-for-profit organization dedicated to research and education in the fields of consciousness and multidimensionality. You can visit the IAC’s website at www.iacworld.org. 

Our meetups include classes on a variety of topics, including the OBE, psychic faculty (including clairvoyance, telepathy, and remote viewing), subtle energies (also known as bioenergy, chi, or prana), and evolution of consciousness. The most popular of these classes is the Consciousness Development Program, a 40-hour course containing the most high-quality, up-to-date information currently available on the OBE and psychic phenomena, as well as hands-on practical classes to have an OBE yourself. To stay current on all the classes offered, check out the calendar on our Meetup page, or join the mailing list by sending an e-mail to boston@iacworld.org.

If you would like to put your OBE skills to the test, check out our OBE Fly-In Exercise, an ongoing activity for our members.  To participate, try to have an OBE to discern the mystery object hidden in our New York office – it is revealed at the close of the experiment.  For more information, visit the Fly-In Project site on our Meetup page at: www.meetup.com/NYC-OBE/pages/OBE_Fly-In_Project.

Thank you for visiting! The group is moderated by David, a volunteer at the IAC. If you have any questions, feel free to e-mail us at meetup@iacworld.org.
item.name: The Boston Out-of-Body Experience Meetup
